name: Book Of Merlin
description: "Book of Merlin" In the game you will act as the  descendant of Wizard Merlin, you need to solve  different puzzles remained in the Magic Tower  with your wisdom. You will get the unique power  from the book of Merlin after crack the seal!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4790M CPU @3.60GHz Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790M CPU @3.60GHz Memory: 16000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1024 MB available space
